tasks.label: Deploy Kustomize from URL List in .vscode/tasks.json
Setup RKE2 kubeconfig
tasks.command: sudo chmod a+r /etc/rancher/rke2/rke2.yaml && export KUBECONFIG=/etc/rancher/rke2/rke2.yaml && echo 'KUBECONFIG set to /etc/rancher/rke2/rke2.yaml'

inputs.description: Select a kustomize URL to deploy
